attributes.action: announce a General Election to be held in September 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the latest by-election defeat Labour ministers have publicly admitted their party has no mandate to govern by referring to it as being a "no nation" party. A General Election is now needed to restore democratic government to the country and produce a Prime Minister and Cabinet that have the support of the electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
